wikipedia_page.main: Bert Errol (born Isaac Whitehouse; 11 August 1883 – 28 November 1949) was a British singer and female impersonator, who was a popular entertainer in both Britain and the United States.

response: | Anthony Slide, "Bert Errol", The Encyclopedia of Vaudeville, University Press of Mississippi, 2012, p.161
Its photo of Bert Errol in drag featured on a postcard. It published a photograph of minstrel performers in blackface.
